footer.description: Zinc Creative Studio is a creative brand specializing in custom merchandise and event branding solutions.
login.title: Login
home.foreword.body: Welcome to Zinc Creative Studio, a creative brand focused on designing and producing high-quality creative products for brands and events. We combine creativity, strategy, and craftsmanship to deliver meaningful experiences and help our clients create a strong and lasting brand presence through every project we undertake.
about.about_us: Zinc Creative Studio is a creative brand that focuses on delivering innovative products and creative solutions for branding and events. We specialize in designing and producing high-quality merchandise that helps brands communicate their identity.
about.since.body: Founded in 2023, Zinc Creative Studio has grown with a strong commitment to creativity, quality, and continuous innovation in every project we handle.
about.vision.body: To become a leading creative studio that delivers impactful products and memorable brand experiences through innovation and creativity.
about.mision.1: To design and produce high-quality creative products that represent our clients’ brand identity.
about.mision.2: To support events and brand activations with innovative merchandise and creative solutions.
about.mision.3: To combine creativity, strategy, and craftsmanship in every project we deliver.
profile.profile.body: Zinc Creative Studio is a creative brand specializing in custom merchandise and event branding solutions. We focus on creating high-quality products that help brands communicate their identity and deliver memorable experiences.
profile.experience.body: Since 2023, Zinc Creative Studio has collaborated with various clients from corporate companies, communities, and event organizers. Our experience includes supporting seminars, exhibitions, product launches, and promotional events with creative merchandise and branding materials.
profile.reason.1: High-quality creative products with attention to detail
profile.reason.2: Experienced in handling events and brand activations
profile.reason.4: Flexible solutions tailored to client needs
profile.cta.body: Let's straighten things out and check our products!
products.none.body: We're currently updating our product catalog. Please check back soon!

invoice.status.desc: Our team will contact you within 1x24 hours to confirm order details and payment.
